info.name: koa-map-router
info.description: This is the map router for KOA and Ginkgoch Map Library.

request.description: Get a map tile image with XYZ coordinates.
Get all groups state in the map.
Get current map state in JSON format.

item.name: Get all layers in a specified group

request.description: Get all layers in a specified group in the map.

response.name: Get all layers in a specified group

item.name: Get a layer in a specified group

request.description: Get a layer in a specified group in the map.

response.name: Get a layer named "cntry02" in a specified group named "Default"
Get a layer in a specified group with some specified fields

item.name: Get all fields info in a specified layer

request.description: Get a layer in a specified group in the map.

response.name: Get all fields info in a specified layer
Get all fields info in a specified layer

item.name: Get features from a specific layer

request.description: Get a layer in a specified group in the map.

response.name: Get features from a specific layer with supported filters

item.name: Query features from a specific layer

request.description: Get a layer in a specified group in the map.

response.name: Query features from a specific layer

item.name: Get all properties from a specific layer

request.description: Get all properties from a specific layer in a map.

response.name: Get all properties from a specific layer with filters

query.description: The returning field names, separate by ','
The feature index start to fetch, starts from 0

item.name: Get a property values from a specific layer

request.description: Get a property values from a specific layer in a map.

response.name: Get a property values from a specific layer with supported filter

query.description: The returning field names, separate by ','

response.name: Get a property values from a specific layer
